name: @backinthirty/alexa-for-lg-webos-tv-skill
description: The code for the For LG webOS TV Alexa Skill.
author: Paul E. Bender <pebender@gmail.com> (http://www.backinthirty.net)

scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json tsconfig.tsbuildinfo dist types package-lock.json *.zip package *.tgz
scripts.install_modules: (cd ../common && npm link) && (npm link "@backinthirty/alexa-for-lg-webos-tv-common") && npm install && (cp src/types/*.d.ts node_modules/@types/)
scripts.pack: npm pack && rm -rf package && rm -rf *.zip && tar zxf *.tgz && (cd package && zip -r `ls ../*.tgz | sed -e 's/\.tgz$/.zip/'` .) && rm -rf package && rm -rf *.tgz
